content: **the stony stitch used in creating this beanie adds extra warmth and texture this pattern is designed for men but can easily be adapted for an adult woman with the change of hook size the design is created working top down you can also find the matching scarf in my ravelry store or in the bundle collection shop on my website ** find the matching scarf pattern here https //www ravelry
